question: As-salaamo-alaikom Brother. I am a young lady in my early twenties and recently had a dream in which my late grandmother spoke to me.
answer:
QUESTION
It was about a marriage partner. She showed me two of them, one a non-muslim friend and another a muslim. She said choose the superior one. Please advise me what this could possibly mean in this context. Jazakallah
ANSWER


Share:
Any person who has the fear for Allah, will take care of you. A person who
is void of that can make life miserable for you. The dream is an advise to
choose a marriage partner having Islamic values and principles.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
